snippet.title: Eldest Souls - Ability Sandbox Tutorial
snippet.description:
⚔️ Your Build. Your Rules. ⚔️

Discover the Ability Sandbox. Claim the power of Ancient Gods and turn it against them.

Set in a grim, dark fantasy world, 'Eldest Souls' is innovating the genre by associating boss-rush gameplay, together with a high level of combat customization. The innovative combat mechanics are quick to pick-up and hard to master, offering unique layers of complexity and challenging bosses, revitalizing the souls-like genre. 

New demo is now available on Steam, and with it the contest for those who like hacking and slashing.
Demo: https://bit.ly/3chsDTm
More info about contest you can here: bit.ly/EldestSoulsContest

#EldestSouls #UnitedLabel #indiegame

Steam: https://bit.ly/3chsDTm
GOG.com: https://bit.ly/37sPDgB
Nintendo: https://bit.ly/33mLWaC 


Talk with us on Discord: https://discord.com/invite/utdlabelgames + Fallen Flag Studio https://discordapp.com/invite/CDRQDFc

Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/UnitedLabelGames/+ Fallen Flag Studio https://www.facebook.com/fallenflagstudio/
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/UtdLabelGames + Fallen Flag Studio https://twitter.com/Fallen_Flag
